Title: Remote Photonic Sensing of Cerebral Hemodynamics via Spatial-Temporal Analysis of Back-Scattered Laser Light
Abstract: © 2019 OSA.The ability to remotely extract cerebral hemodynamics from specific locations on the brain using time varied speckle patterns is innovative. The first step towards remote sensing of brain activity and stroke is presented.
SubjectAreas: Atomic and Molecular Physics, and Optics
